title: Another month, another incident, another silence/gag...
selftext:
Not sharing the link to this, but we all know what, where, who is this about. 

I sometimes feel like going back to my rage filled response as I used to couple of years ago.

But I haven't yet, seeing all people like Anurag Kashyap, Virar Kohli, etc etc. They mind their buisness so do I.

How do you people here, respond to such situations?
cleaned_text: another month another incident another silencegag sharing link know sometimes feel like going back rage filled response used couple years ago havent yet seeing people like anurag kashyap virar kohli etc etc mind buisness people respond situations
